term: Effects of the cotton gin (on the South)
content:
most people thought that slavery was going to go away which is why it hasn’t really faced much argument against
	it was not an economically efficient form of labor
however, the cotton gin makes cotton farming and work way more efficient

it has the impact of making slavery way more economically efficient and profitable

this is the turning point where we once thought that slavery was going to go away, but after this point it starts to expand and expand greatly
if it - slavery - doesn’t go away, we start to ask questions
	it first becomes a moral issue and then a political issue
